story:
*Tradução em português abaixo

Who are we? 

We are 4 friends from India who have a common dream.

Vishal Singh Dhaybhai, 2009 Warrior, believes that life is beautiful. He trusts the call of his heart and follows his soul wherever it takes him. He loves sharing stories and creating art from waste products. He knows that life is magical :)

Rachana Radhakrishna, Warrior 2011, is a dreamer. She loves music and painting. She loves spreading smiles and dancing and enjoys taking care of everybody around her. Her dream is to see the world as one :)

Azeer Attari, Warrior 2011, loves laughing, dancing, singing and creating art. He loves listening to peoples stories and inspiring them to follow the call of their hearts. He is a bio-architect(http://pyht.org/) and an artist. He is a believer in love and in the power of the universe :)

Areen Attari, Warrior 2012(http://www.areenattari-gsa2012.blogspot.in/), is a bio-architect who has a passion to spread love and laughter in the world. Short, a little fat, and balding, he proclaims to be sexy and he knows it! He loves to travel, meet new people, laugh loudly and dreams of a happier beautiful world :) 


What is Warriors Without Weapons?

Warriors Without Weapons is an experiential international leadership and social entrepreneurship training program offered to youth to provide the tools needed to transform realities anywhere in the world. 

To know more about Warriors Without Weapons please log on to http://www.warriorswithoutweapons.net/


What is the OASIS Game?

During this 1 month program in Santos, Brazil we learned to play the OASIS Game which is a hands-on social tool that empowers communities to recognize their beauties, talents and intrinsic resources by creating the possibility for them to change their own lives while being more inter-dependent on each other rather than on any external support. 

To know more about the OASIS Game in INDIA please see 
1) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fSE6GbYAUEU  and  2)https://picasaweb.google.com/116184129704511351098


The Invitation

This year we have been invited and selected to go to Brazil again, in early 2014, to go deeper in this journey!  YAY! :)

Ever since we had the opportunity to go to Brazil, we have been practicing our community development skills around India. Over time we have had beautiful experiences, faced many challenges and developed our own style of inspiring change within ourselves and also within groups of people and their environment. This invitation gives us an opportunity to go deeper within our self, share with our fellow warriors our journeys and most importantly a chance to learn and improve our own abilities by leaving our known comfort zone and getting in touch with other cultures only to return to India enriched and energized with a magnificent experience ready to share it with the world. 

This is a really beautiful opportunity for the 4 of us because we truly believe we can make a difference, and we feel amazingly fulfilled and happy empowering others to believe in themselves and the strength of their collective dreams. 

We want to go to Brazil!! :)


This is how your contribution will make a difference

Its simple really - Your money will have a DIRECT POSITIVE impact on the lives of many people around the world, and help us be the change we want to see.

This is the place and platform to make it happen.

Other than that your contribution will also help in the following ways 

- Development of us at an individual level through the program 

- Development of us at a team/group level through the program

- People inspire people and by sharing the Oasis Game, we aim to inspire friends transform their lives all over the world.

- Being bio-architects, we want to use our knowledge and networks to spread this through the Oasis Games.

- More Oasis Games means transforming more dreams to realities in cities and rural areas – affecting change in all directions – creating more opportunities for learning/action exchanges between people and communities.

- Our Oasis India team will be expanded. In a country with a population of a billion, we wish to grow from a team of 7 to 7 million!  This is called the "Ripple effect" :)


You will...
…also be helping people/organisations/students from different parts of the world to realize their dreams and create a better, peaceful and happy place for us all. Ultimately, we believe that you will be helping yourself as well :) 

Plus you will get access to some really fun and also meaningful perks!


We need

To travel to Brazil from India, participate in the program, we need a minimum of $3,500 each.
This includes
Airline costs - $2,000
Accommodation and Course costs - $1,000
Other costs - $500

Total = $3,500/person

The minimum TOTAL amount required for four of us is - $14,000

If we do not achieve our target, then only one or two of us will be able to make the program. If not funding is raised for any of us, the money will go towards the Oasis India fund.


Other ways to help

Send us your love and feel free to share this project with how many ever people you can :) The more people we reach the better for everyone :)
Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools to help boost our project!

Do feel free to get in touch with us at any time :)

Love, Peace and Hugs!


*

Quem somos nós?

Somos quatro amigos da Índia que têm um sonho comum.

Vishal Singh Dhaybhai, Guerreiro de 2009, acredita que a vida é bela. Ele confia no chamado de seu coração e segue sua alma onde quer que ela o leve. Ele adora compartilhar histórias e criar arte a partir de resíduos. Ele sabe que a vida é mágica. :)


Rachana Radhakrishna, Guerreira de 2011, é uma sonhadora. Ela ama música e pintura. Adora espalhar sorrisos e dança e gosta de cuidar de todos ao seu redor. Seu sonho é ver o mundo como um só. :)


Azeer Attari, Guerreiro de 2011, adora rir, dançar, cantar e criar arte. Ele ama ouvir histórias dos povos e inspirando-os a seguir o chamado de seus corações. É um bio-arquiteto ( http://pyht.org/ ) e um artista. Um crente no amor e no poder do universo :)


Areen Attari, Warrior 2012 ( http://www.areenattari-gsa2012.blogspot.in/ ), é um bio-arquiteto que tem uma paixão para espalhar amor e alegria no mundo. Baixo, gordinho, e careca, não gosta de ser chamado de sexy, mas sabe que é! Adora viajar, conhecer novas pessoas, rir alto e sonha com um mundo maravilhosamente mais feliz :)


O que é Guerreiros Sem Armas?

Guerreiros Sem Armas é um programa experimental internacional de treinamento de liderança e empreendedorismo social oferecido aos jovens para fornecer as ferramentas necessárias para transformar realidades em qualquer lugar do mundo.


Para saber mais sobre Guerreiros Sem Armas, por favor acesse http://www.warriorswithoutweapons.net


O que é o jogo OASIS ?

Durante o programa de um mês em Santos, Brasil, aprendemos a jogar o Jogo OASIS, uma ferramenta social mão na massa que permite as comunidades reconhecerem suas belezas, talentos e recursos intrínsecos, criando a possibilidade de que eles mudem suas próprias vidas sendo mais interdependentes uns dos outros, em vez de qualquer apoio externo.


Para saber mais sobre o jogo OASIS na Índia consulte

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fSE6GbYAUEU

https://picasaweb.google.com/116184129704511351098



O convite

Este ano, foram convidados e selecionados para ir ao Brasil novamente, no início de 2014, para ir mais fundo nesta jornada ! YAY ! :)

Desde que tivemos a oportunidade de ir para o Brasil, temos praticado as nossas capacidades de desenvolvimento da comunidade em toda Índia. Ao longo do tempo, tivemos belas experiências, enfrentamos muitos desafios e desenvolvemos o nosso próprio estilo de inspirar a mudança dentro de nós mesmos e também dentro de grupos de pessoas e seu ambiente. Este convite dá-nos a oportunidade de ir mais fundo dentro de nós mesmos, compartilhar com nossos companheiros guerreiros nossas viagens e, sobretudo, a oportunidade de aprender e melhorar as nossas próprias habilidades, deixando nossa zona de conforto e entrar em contato com outras culturas só para voltar para a Índia enriquecidos e energizados com uma magnífica experiência, prontos para compartilhá-la com o mundo.

Esta é realmente uma bela oportunidade para nós, porque realmente acreditamos que podemos fazer a diferença, e nos sentimos incrivelmente realizados e felizes em capacitar outros a acreditar em si mesmos e na força dos seus sonhos coletivos.

Queremos ir para o Brasil ! :)


Esta é a forma como a sua contribuição vai fazer a diferença

É realmente simples - Seu dinheiro terá um impacto positivo direto sobre a vida de muitas pessoas ao redor do mundo, e nos ajudará a ser a mudança que queremos ver.

Este é o lugar e a plataforma para que isso aconteça.

Sua contribuição ajudará também das seguintes formas

- Desenvolvimento nosso em um nível individual, através do programa

- Desenvolvimento nosso em um nível de grupo / equipe, através do programa

- Inspirar pessoas e compartilhar o Jogo Oasis, nosso objetivo é inspirar os amigos a transformar suas vidas em todo o mundo.

- Ser bio-arquitetos. Queremos utilizar o nosso conhecimento e as redes para espalhar isso por meio dos Jogos Oasis.

- Mais Jogos Oásis significa transformar mais sonhos em realidades em cidades e áreas rurais - que afetam a mudança em todos os sentidos - criar mais oportunidades de intercâmbio de aprendizagem / ação entre pessoas e comunidades.

- Nossa equipe Oásis Índia será ampliada. Em um país com uma população de um bilhão, queremos crescer a partir de uma equipe de 7-7.000.000 ! Este é o chamado "efeito cascata" :)


Você também vai...

... ajudar pessoas / organizações / estudantes de diferentes partes do mundo para realizar seus sonhos e criar um melhor, lugar tranquilo e feliz para todos nós. Em última análise, acreditamos que você ajudará a si mesmo. :)

Além disso, você terá acesso a algumas regalias muito divertidas e significativas !




Precisamos

Para viajar para o Brasil da Índia, participar do programa, é preciso um mínimo de 3,500 dólares cada.

Isto inclui:

Custos das companhias aéreas - $ 2.000

Alojamento e custos do curso - $ 1.000

Outros custos - $ 500


Total = $ 3,500 / pessoa


O montante TOTAL mínimo exigido para nós quatro é de $ 14.000

Se não atingir a meta, apenas um ou dois poderá fazer o programa. Se não for possível levar nenhum de nós, o dinheiro irá para o fundo de Oásis Índia.


Outras formas de ajudar

Envie-nos o seu amor e sinta-se livre para compartilhar esse projeto com quantas pessoas puder. :) Quanto mais pessoas souberem, melhor para todos :)

Não se esqueça de usar as ferramentas de compartilhamento IndieGoGo, Facebook, Twitter e outras para ajudar a impulsionar o nosso projeto !

Não hesite em entrar em contato conosco a qualquer hora :)

Amor, paz e abraços!

Adora viajar, conhecer novas pessoas, rir alto e sonha com um mundo maravilhosamente mais feliz :)O que é Guerreiros Sem Armas?Guerreiros Sem Armas é um programa experimental internacional de treinamento de liderança e empreendedorismo social oferecido aos jovens para fornecer as ferramentas necessárias para transformar realidades em qualquer lugar do mundo.Para saber mais sobre Guerreiros Sem Armas, por favor acesse http://www.warriorswithoutweapons.netO que é o jogo OASIS ?Durante o programa de um mês em Santos, Brasil, aprendemos a jogar o Jogo OASIS, uma ferramenta social mão na massa que permite as comunidades reconhecerem suas belezas, talentos e recursos intrínsecos, criando a possibilidade de que eles mudem suas próprias vidas sendo mais interdependentes uns dos outros, em vez de qualquer apoio externo.Para saber mais sobre o jogo OASIS na Índia consultehttp://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fSE6GbYAUEUhttps://picasaweb.google.com/116184129704511351098O conviteEste ano, foram convidados e selecionados para ir ao Brasil novamente, no início de 2014, para ir mais fundo nesta jornada ! YAY ! :)Desde que tivemos a oportunidade de ir para o Brasil, temos praticado as nossas capacidades de desenvolvimento da comunidade em toda Índia. Ao longo do tempo, tivemos belas experiências, enfrentamos muitos desafios e desenvolvemos o nosso próprio estilo de inspirar a mudança dentro de nós mesmos e também dentro de grupos de pessoas e seu ambiente. Este convite dá-nos a oportunidade de ir mais fundo dentro de nós mesmos, compartilhar com nossos companheiros guerreiros nossas viagens e, sobretudo, a oportunidade de aprender e melhorar as nossas próprias habilidades, deixando nossa zona de conforto e entrar em contato com outras culturas só para voltar para a Índia enriquecidos e energizados com uma magnífica experiência, prontos para compartilhá-la com o mundo.Esta é realmente uma bela oportunidade para nós, porque realmente acreditamos que podemos fazer a diferença, e nos sentimos incrivelmente realizados e felizes em capacitar outros a acreditar em si mesmos e na força dos seus sonhos coletivos.Queremos ir para o Brasil ! :)Esta é a forma como a sua contribuição vai fazer a diferençaÉ realmente simples - Seu dinheiro terá um impacto positivo direto sobre a vida de muitas pessoas ao redor do mundo, e nos ajudará a ser a mudança que queremos ver.Este é o lugar e a plataforma para que isso aconteça.Sua contribuição ajudará também das seguintes formas- Desenvolvimento nosso em um nível individual, através do programa- Desenvolvimento nosso em um nível de grupo / equipe, através do programa- Inspirar pessoas e compartilhar o Jogo Oasis, nosso objetivo é inspirar os amigos a transformar suas vidas em todo o mundo.- Ser bio-arquitetos. Queremos utilizar o nosso conhecimento e as redes para espalhar isso por meio dos Jogos Oasis.- Mais Jogos Oásis significa transformar mais sonhos em realidades em cidades e áreas rurais - que afetam a mudança em todos os sentidos - criar mais oportunidades de intercâmbio de aprendizagem / ação entre pessoas e comunidades.- Nossa equipe Oásis Índia será ampliada. Em um país com uma população de um bilhão, queremos crescer a partir de uma equipe de 7-7.000.000 ! Este é o chamado "efeito cascata" :)Você também vai...... ajudar pessoas / organizações / estudantes de diferentes partes do mundo para realizar seus sonhos e criar um melhor, lugar tranquilo e feliz para todos nós. Em última análise, acreditamos que você ajudará a si mesmo. :)Além disso, você terá acesso a algumas regalias muito divertidas e significativas !PrecisamosPara viajar para o Brasil da Índia, participar do programa, é preciso um mínimo de 3,500 dólares cada.Isto inclui:Custos das companhias aéreas - $ 2.000Alojamento e custos do curso - $ 1.000Outros custos - $ 500Total = $ 3,500 / pessoaO montante TOTAL mínimo exigido para nós quatro é de $ 14.000Se não atingir a meta, apenas um ou dois poderá fazer o programa. Se não for possível levar nenhum de nós, o dinheiro irá para o fundo de Oásis Índia.Outras formas de ajudarEnvie-nos o seu amor e sinta-se livre para compartilhar esse projeto com quantas pessoas puder. :) Quanto mais pessoas souberem, melhor para todos :)Não se esqueça de usar as ferramentas de compartilhamento IndieGoGo, Facebook, Twitter e outras para ajudar a impulsionar o nosso projeto !Não hesite em entrar em contato conosco a qualquer hora :)Amor, paz e abraços!

story:
Who I am:
 
My name is Kat Murphy.  I live on a small farm.  I am the butcher, baker and the candlestick maker plus the dairy maid, cheese maker and Momma to a handful of bottle baby goats.  I have been writing a blog, Self Sustained Living, since late 2008. It's a journal of the trials, triumphs, defeats and all around farm living.

 

Project Goals:

Through a series of unfortunate events, I find myself without means to keep this farm going.  I need your support to run the farm and continue on the path I have started with improving the farm and building a commercial kitchen for the cheeses and baked goods.  The new commercial kitchen space will allow me to teach cheese making classes along with bread making and canning seminars and provide me with a steady venue for the skills I can offer to the surrounding community.

 

This year I have received my food sanitation llicense and my cottage exeption certificate.  2 big steps toward my goal of providing home grown and produced food to my community.  Even with all my small successes, I now find myself in danger of losing everything I have worked for.  I need your help to keep going for the next 90 days while I search for some sort of outside employment and build the kitchen to create the means for the farm to support itself.

1,200 to make the farm payment

600 to cover the electric use for the farm and my DIY contruction

225 to cover the insurance

240 to cover the water so no animals go thirsty

180 for feed to keep the milk animals producing for cheese making

 

The storage house has a workable kitchen that can easily be cleaned up and brought to inspection pass levels.

I know it looks rough but it's been a workshop of sorts and the house has been used as storage for the past 4 years while it lacked some basic plumbing and a hot water tank.  It will be cleaned up, the carpet removed, everything painted and brought up to spec for public health code.

350 for a stove

300 for linoleum

80 for paint

275 for a hot water tank

100 to repair the broken water lines

900 for 2 refridgerators (one for cheese, one for other food products)

I already have the control box  and the moisture monitor needed for the cheese cave so I can age the cheeses the required amount of time for public sale.

 

I know this is a viable goal.  The positive response to my products at local farmers markets is more than positive, even with the limitations on what I can offer to the public.  The goats milk and cows milk along with the home made cheeses will bring this farm into it's own.  The jams, jellies, goats milk soap, hand made whole grain breads already have a niche interest with the surrounding community.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't help me with a donation, you can still help me keep my farm and make it self sustainable by sharing this link and telling everyone you know about me and asking them to share the link too.

story:
“Travel is fatal to prejudice, bigotry, and narrow-mindedness, and many of our people need it sorely on these accounts. Broad, wholesome, charitable views of men and things cannot be acquired by vegetating in one little corner of the earth all one's lifetime.” – Mark Twain

“Not all those who wander are lost”- J.R. R. Tolkien

“Every dreamer knows that it is entirely possible to be homesick for a place you've never been to, perhaps more homesick than for familiar ground.”- Judith Thurman 

Hola,

We are Weston LaCroix and Jessica Schaefer. We are a young, adventurous, and motivated couple who love to travel. We both have learned so much about our 

surroundings (and ourselves) by traveling.... we hope to further other people's traveling experiences by introducing them to the beauties of Cozumel, Mexico.     

We are seeking aid in living out our dream of bringing people to the beautiful island of Cozumel for an intimate Bed & Breakfast experience at the Dive Inn Cozumel. We quit our corporate jobs, sold the majority of our belongings, packed up as much as we could fit into our carry-ons, and moved to a spectacular island in the Caribbean. We have chosen to take advantage of an incredible opportunity to experience another culture, learn the Spanish language, gain a unique perspective by earning a living out side of the U.S., grow outside of our usual comfort zones, and fulfill our dream of living in paradise.    

Cozumel, Mexico is a small island off of the Yucutan Peninsula that boasts crystal clear water, white sand beaches, and one of the largest and most beautiful reefs on earth. The staple of the small and friendly community of Cozumel is its beauty both above and below the surface of the water. People from all around the world flock to Cozumel to experience the flavorful food, the hospitable people, and the numerous world-class water activities.

We hope to establish a successful Bed & Breakfast that will not only allow us to earn a living but also enable our friends and family to visit the beauty that Cozumel has to offer. We have procured a 3 bedroom, 2 bath house not far from the coast and just a few blocks away from Cozumel’s downtown square. The Dive Inn Cozumel Bed & Breakfast is located in in the heart of San Miguel de Cozumel; shops, restaurants, bars, and water activities are within a short walking distance.

The house is cozy and traditional Mexican style home. The first floor consist of the kitchen and dining area, the living room, and a bathroom. The second floor consists of 3 bedrooms and a bathroom. The top most floor is a roof top terrace that we plan to utilize as a place to lounge and enjoy the views. We also plan on starting a garden on the terrace in order grow some of our own fresh fruits and vegetables that we will use to cook breakfasts with. Speaking of comida (food), we will be serving up some yummy traditional Mexican breakfast meals (and no, traditional Mexican breakfasts do not include breakfast tacos)!

What’s up with the name Dive Inn Cozumel?

Scuba diving is a hobby for both of us. Weston has been a diver for a little over a year now, and I have been an active diver since 2005. I am also a PADI Divemaster and SCUBA Instructor. Cozumel initially drew us both in with its world renowned diving; the reefs that line the western shore of Cozumel are some of the largest and most impressive reefs in the world. It did not take us long to realize the benefits of establishing hospitable accommodations specifically for divers, snorkelers, and beach lovers. Our B & B will cater to those who love and respect the ocean. We will decorate our walls with colorful images of the Cozumelian reefs, our bookshelf (once we buy one) will be stacked full of dive magazines and interesting ocean books, and we will promote activities with companies on the island who practice ethically and in the best interest of the ocean and its inhabitants. For example, if someone wants to scuba dive we will introduce them to Chucho, a local PADI Divemaster who has made his dive operation (www.chucho-underwater.com) “green” by converting his old motors to more efficient ones that do not pollute the water. We hope that through our Bed and Breakfast we will be able to educate people on the importance of taking care of the oceans.

What’s unique about our space?

One thing that we love about Cozumel is the bright colors, flowers, and hand made crafts that adorn the houses, parks, and streets. In remodeling and furnishing our house we aim to do so in an artistic manner that utilizes the materials and styles that are indigenous to the region. In doing so, we will we create a traditional styled Mexican casa that is both inviting and stimulating to the local artists on the island. 

What will the money be used for??

Our house currently has no furniture. After doing a lot of price comparing we have concluded that in order to comfortably furnish the B & B we will need to raise $9,000. This money will go towards purchasing the following:

·  Beds for each room

·  Various furniture (side tables, etc.)

·  4 AC units (and installation labor)

·  Refrigerator

·  Cook top, microwave, toaster oven

·  Kitchen table and chairs

·  Bar stools

·  Sofas

·  Coffee table & TV stand

·  Outdoor furniture 


As a thank you for helping us reach our goal…

$5 donation- Because you believe in following one's dream. Gracias

$10 donation- Because you REALLY believe in following dreams. Thoughts become things. Muchas gracias 

$25 donation = Dive Inn Cozumel sticker and a personalized thank you letter

$50 donation = Dive Inn Cozumel sticker, a personalized thank you letter, and recognition on our Facebook page

$75 donation = Your name on a "funders tile" that will be incorporated into our roof top terrace mosaic, Dive Inn Cozumel sticker, a personalized thank you letter, and recognition on our Facebook page

$100 donation = Dive Inn Cozumel sticker and T-Shirt, a personalized thank you letter, and recognition on our Facebook page

$200 donation= One night stay at our B & B, Dive Inn Cozumel sticker and T-Shirt, a personalized thank you letter, and recognition on our Facebook page

$250 donation = Half off of a 2 nights stay at our B & B, Dive Inn Cozumel sticker and T-Shirt, a personalized thank you letter, and recognition on our Facebook page

$500 donation = 1 room for 3 nights at our B & B (breakfast included),

Dive Inn Cozumel sticker and T-Shirt, a personalized thank you letter, and recognition on our Facebook page

$1000 donation = 1 room for 7 nights at our B & B (breakfast included),

Dive Inn Cozumel sticker and T-Shirt, a personalized thank you letter, and recognition on our Facebook page

* Dates are subject to availability; must be used by July 2015

** You do not need to schedule your stay when you make your donation. Simply contact us when you are ready to start planning your vacation.

If you are unable to contribute to Dive Inn Cozumel we completely understand. However, we do hope that you will not hesitate to share our information with people that you know who may be able to help us.  

We thank you in advance for helping to build our Bed & Breakfast (and our dreams). We greatly appreciate your support and generosity.

Muchas gracias!

Weston & Jessica

story:
An Electric Car Passion is Born:

Hi, my name is Kent Gubrud. I am an experienced attorney who ran my own successful law practice for 15 years and now runs a successful NYC realty business that caters to NYC visitors and corporate members.  Prior to moving to NYC and law school,  because of my interest in cars, I trained and worked as an automotive technician.  But about five years ago, I became intrigued with electric cars after learning about Tesla Motor Cars' plans to produce a beautiful, purely electric Roadster. 

Tesla Roadster

Tesla promised its Roadster would accelerate from 0-60 in less than 4 seconds, have a range of nearly 250 miles per charge and run completely on its non-polluting, inexpensive and renewable electric fuel.  "Haaah!," many said in disbelief (actually, I made that quote up).

Impressed and fascianted with Tesla's bold and unique Roadster plans,  I have spent and continue spending countless hours studying them.  I learned that electric cars typically have only three main powertrain parts (compared to many more parts on gas engines). The electric powertrain does not require lubrication or the usual repairs or maintenance. There are no oil changes or tune ups needed.  There are no valves, pistons, rings, crankshaft, camshaft or cooling system to maintain, repair or replace.   Electric powertrains do not have the same heat or stress as internal combustion engines.  In fact, unlike gas cars, electric power trains can typically drive for a million miles(!) without needing maintenance or repairs.

The electricity to operate an electric vehicle typically costs much less than half the cost of gas and can even be produced from renewable sources!

The more I learn about them, the more convinced I become of the many incredible benefits of using electric vehicles.

In 2008, to the surprise of many, Tesla delivered its amazing, all-electric Roadster exactly as promised --  the Roadster is incredible!!  It's beautiful and runs on quiet, non-polluting, all-electric power, has very low operating costs and excellent performance.

Tesla Roadster

Recently Tesla has built and begun to deliver its Model S sedan which makes many more advancements.  This delivery has caused substantial excitement among many followers.  Model S can carry 5 adults and 2 children, has a range of up to 300 miles per charge, also with amazing handling and acceleration and gorgeous design.  Yet the base price is much less than the Roadster (about half with the smallest battery pack and range of 160 miles).

               Model S

Of course, the final price will depend upon options chosen (including especially the battery pack size).  

Now, many other car makers are following Tesla's lead and introducing pure electric cars as well as hybrid electric cars to the market place (like Nissan, GM, Audi, BMW, Mercedes to name but a few).

Seeing all this, I became obsessed with finding a way to build a business around electric cars that could take advantage of their many incredible advantages (i.e. lack of pollution, lower fuel costs, lower maintenance, repairs and greater longevity) to help build a profitable business despite the high upfront costs. 

The Grand Plan:

Then it hit me!  I realized how I would build a profitable, earth-improving electric car business that would be accessible to people of all income levels.   

But first, some relevant background. We moved to NYC about ten years ago and started a business in the tourist industry. The NYC tourist industry is  huge.  Nearly 50 million people visit NYC each year!   Rarely do any of these visitors bring their own vehicles. And few of the 8 million NYC residents own their own cars.  In addition there are many resident businesses (real estate companies, marketing, investment and law firms, television and movie companies) that constantly need to arrange transportation for their employees, customers and partners.  All of this means that -- in NYC -- limos and taxis are very popular modes of transportation.

Many associate limos with extravagence.  However,  given the

unique challenges of driving in the Big Apple, limos are actually very practical as well as popular -- and not only for those with substantial expendable incomes.   Limos with drivers can comfortably carry large groups of people and their luggage around the City without worry of parking, traffic or getting lost (and there are lots of big groups that come to NYC).  Also, critically, unlike taxis, limos can be arranged over the phone and internet.  For example, as part of our tourist business we frequently need to arrange airport transportation for groups of guests.  We cannot schedule taxis in advance (as they MUST be hailed on the street) and so we almost never use them for our guests' airport transport; we only only limos.  Similarly, due to this scheduling convenience and size advantages, many other NYC businesses regularly use limos the same way.  

Consequently, counting both stretched and regular town cars, there are actually more limos (14,000) in NYC than taxis (13,000).

However, limos are obviously large and lack efficient hybrid power trains that smaller taxis can often use (like the Toyota Prius). They take a lot of fuel and are expensive to run.  Gas expense makes up more than 75% of the total operational costs.  Additionally, with mostly City driving, limo businesses have significant maintenance and repair costs and then high replacement costs after relatively few miles of hard driving.  Limos also create much unwanted air, noise and water pollution. 

But in ALL of these crucial areas (i.e. cost of fuel, maintenance, repairs, replacement and pollution) electric vehicles far surpass gas vehicles. 

Our plan is to start a limo business that converts gas limos to run on electricity and offer such electric limos for hire for visitors and residents at rates that fits most budgets.  While some people are able to appreciate the many benefits, we need an actual, physical, operational electric limo to start. Once we have at least one, we will offer to transport hundreds of NYC visitors from our extensive existing customer base.  We will thus be able to quickly convert this limo into a vehicle that actually makes money, which we will then use to buy and convert more gas limos.  Having an actual electric limo that is making money will also make it MUCH easier to raise the investment funds that we need to build multiple electric vehicles.

Because our simple electric power train will be dependable for many, many miles, we will be able to purchase a good USED luxury limo with high mileage, providing substantial savings in our upfront costs, and offsetting the high cost of the batteries and conversion.  We plan to raise enough to start with a high-end Mercedes or Rolls Royce limo because of the greater rates we can

charge.  But if we need to start with a less expensive Lincoln limo, we could simply adjust our rates downward, and still offer

 

all the other benefits.  Our operational costs will be substantially less than similar luxury limos powered by gas. 

With your help -- our unique electric limo business will be the first one in the world!  We have developed great business and marketing plans, which will help snag valuable publicity and attract customers who might never have considered using a regular gas limo.  By running on electricity, we will be eliminating a large percentage of the air, noise and water pollution that our vehicles would otherwise create.  Our business will help expose many new people every day to the many amazing benefits of electric propulsion. 

As discussed in our video, one of the greatest challenges has been to locate a builder who can competently convert our large limos to electricity.  Most electric conversion shops focus on smaller vehicles which are easier and cheaper to convert.  However, we have found an experienced and talented builder who has already successfully converted many large vehicles.  It will take several weeks for his shop to build the first limo.  We also need to pay for the batteries up front before they can be ordered (which, once ordered, will take several weeks to be delivered).  If we do not raise all of the funds we need in this campaign, we will use what we do raise to purchase the batteries and/or the initial used limo and continue working toward this. Our builder will start on the conversion once we have the batteries and limo purchased.  He is confident and supports the project fully and is therefore willing to work with us.

Given the huge size of the limo industry, there is tremendous room for growth in NYC, as well as opportunities in other U.S. and foreign cities. 

Your investment in this campaign is crucial.  

We can buy a good used Lincoln limo for approximately $20,000.  A Rolls Royce or Mercedes for about $50,000.  The cost of the batteries is about $22,000.  The builder's labor cost of conversion and other electrical components is $25,000.  Thus, we will need approximately $67,000 to build the least expensive electric Lincoln version, plus the costs to license, insure and operate it.  To build a Rolls Royce or Mercedes electric limo will be just under $100K.  We will continue to invest our own funds to launch and are seeking $65,000 to allow us additional funds to at least convert a Lincoln -- or with additional funding, a Rolls Royce or Mercedes limo.  We will also continue to raise funds to convert additional limousines.  

The funds you help us raise will LAUNCH our very first electric rocket!  Every dollar raised will fuel our success!  Small changes can achieve big results.  Join us.  Help us.  Together we will make powerful improvements to our world one limo at a time! 

In return for your support, we offer you some great rewards as described above.  We also have an exciting, secret weapon that we will use to further launch this business into the stratosphere that we cannot disclose at this time on this very public page; but once we reach our initial $65,000 goal, we will disclose this secret plan to each of our backers that have contributed at least $25 as well as provide each such backer with an additional, wonderful gift; we cannot disclose it before that time without putting such plan in jeopardy.  

If you would like to support our cause, but are not presently in a position to help financially, you can still contribute greatly by liking our Facebook page or by following us on Twitter and sending out a sweet tweet on Twitter to your followers with a link to this campaign.  You can use the share tools  on this website too.

Thank you very much! We hope to meet you someday soon and get a chance to show you around NYC in a beautiful, earth-changing electric limo that you helped to make a reality!
story_txt:
An Electric Car Passion is Born:
Hi, my name is Kent Gubrud. I am an experienced attorney who ran my own successful law practice for 15 years and now runs a successful NYC realty business that caters to NYC visitors and corporate members.  Prior to moving to NYC and law school,  because of my interest in cars, I trained and worked as an automotive technician.  But about five years ago, I became intrigued with electric cars after learning about Tesla Motor Cars' plans to produce a beautiful, purely electric Roadster. 

Tesla Roadster
Tesla promised its Roadster would accelerate from 0-60 in less than 4 seconds, have a range of nearly 250 miles per charge and run completely on its non-polluting, inexpensive and renewable electric fuel.  "Haaah!," many said in disbelief (actually, I made that quote up).
Impressed and fascianted with Tesla's bold and unique Roadster plans,  I have spent and continue spending countless hours studying them.  I learned that electric cars typically have only three main powertrain parts (compared to many more parts on gas engines). The electric powertrain does not require lubrication or the usual repairs or maintenance. There are no oil changes or tune ups needed.  There are no valves, pistons, rings, crankshaft, camshaft or cooling system to maintain, repair or replace.   Electric powertrains do not have the same heat or stress as internal combustion engines.  In fact, unlike gas cars, electric power trains can typically drive for a million miles(!) without needing maintenance or repairs.
The electricity to operate an electric vehicle typically costs much less than half the cost of gas and can even be produced from renewable sources!
The more I learn about them, the more convinced I become of the many incredible benefits of using electric vehicles.
In 2008, to the surprise of many, Tesla delivered its amazing, all-electric Roadster exactly as promised --  the Roadster is incredible!!  It's beautiful and runs on quiet, non-polluting, all-electric power, has very low operating costs and excellent performance.

Tesla Roadster
Recently Tesla has built and begun to deliver its Model S sedan which makes many more advancements.  This delivery has caused substantial excitement among many followers.  Model S can carry 5 adults and 2 children, has a range of up to 300 miles per charge, also with amazing handling and acceleration and gorgeous design.  Yet the base price is much less than the Roadster (about half with the smallest battery pack and range of 160 miles).

               Model S
Of course, the final price will depend upon options chosen (including especially the battery pack size).  
Now, many other car makers are following Tesla's lead and introducing pure electric cars as well as hybrid electric cars to the market place (like Nissan, GM, Audi, BMW, Mercedes to name but a few).
Seeing all this, I became obsessed with finding a way to build a business around electric cars that could take advantage of their many incredible advantages (i.e. lack of pollution, lower fuel costs, lower maintenance, repairs and greater longevity) to help build a profitable business despite the high upfront costs. 

The Grand Plan:
Then it hit me!  I realized how I would build a profitable, earth-improving electric car business that would be accessible to people of all income levels.   
But first, some relevant background. We moved to NYC about ten years ago and started a business in the tourist industry. The NYC tourist industry is  huge.  Nearly 50 million people visit NYC each year!   Rarely do any of these visitors bring their own vehicles. And few of the 8 million NYC residents own their own cars.  In addition there are many resident businesses (real estate companies, marketing, investment and law firms, television and movie companies) that constantly need to arrange transportation for their employees, customers and partners.  All of this means that -- in NYC -- limos and taxis are very popular modes of transportation.
Many associate limos with extravagence.  However,  given the

unique challenges of driving in the Big Apple, limos are actually very practical as well as popular -- and not only for those with substantial expendable incomes.   Limos with drivers can comfortably carry large groups of people and their luggage around the City without worry of parking, traffic or getting lost (and there are lots of big groups that come to NYC).  Also, critically, unlike taxis, limos can be arranged over the phone and internet.  For example, as part of our tourist business we frequently need to arrange airport transportation for groups of guests.  We cannot schedule taxis in advance (as they MUST be hailed on the street) and so we almost never use them for our guests' airport transport; we only only limos.  Similarly, due to this scheduling convenience and size advantages, many other NYC businesses regularly use limos the same way.  
Consequently, counting both stretched and regular town cars, there are actually more limos (14,000) in NYC than taxis (13,000).
However, limos are obviously large and lack efficient hybrid power trains that smaller taxis can often use (like the Toyota Prius). They take a lot of fuel and are expensive to run.  Gas expense makes up more than 75% of the total operational costs.  Additionally, with mostly City driving, limo businesses have significant maintenance and repair costs and then high replacement costs after relatively few miles of hard driving.  Limos also create much unwanted air, noise and water pollution. 
But in ALL of these crucial areas (i.e. cost of fuel, maintenance, repairs, replacement and pollution) electric vehicles far surpass gas vehicles. 

Our plan is to start a limo business that converts gas limos to run on electricity and offer such electric limos for hire for visitors and residents at rates that fits most budgets.  While some people are able to appreciate the many benefits, we need an actual, physical, operational electric limo to start. Once we have at least one, we will offer to transport hundreds of NYC visitors from our extensive existing customer base.  We will thus be able to quickly convert this limo into a vehicle that actually makes money, which we will then use to buy and convert more gas limos.  Having an actual electric limo that is making money will also make it MUCH easier to raise the investment funds that we need to build multiple electric vehicles.
Because our simple electric power train will be dependable for many, many miles, we will be able to purchase a good USED luxury limo with high mileage, providing substantial savings in our upfront costs, and offsetting the high cost of the batteries and conversion.  We plan to raise enough to start with a high-end Mercedes or Rolls Royce limo because of the greater rates we can


charge.  But if we need to start with a less expensive Lincoln limo, we could simply adjust our rates downward, and still offer
 

all the other benefits.  Our operational costs will be substantially less than similar luxury limos powered by gas. 

With your help -- our unique electric limo business will be the first one in the world!  We have developed great business and marketing plans, which will help snag valuable publicity and attract customers who might never have considered using a regular gas limo.  By running on electricity, we will be eliminating a large percentage of the air, noise and water pollution that our vehicles would otherwise create.  Our business will help expose many new people every day to the many amazing benefits of electric propulsion. 
As discussed in our video, one of the greatest challenges has been to locate a builder who can competently convert our large limos to electricity.  Most electric conversion shops focus on smaller vehicles which are easier and cheaper to convert.  However, we have found an experienced and talented builder who has already successfully converted many large vehicles.  It will take several weeks for his shop to build the first limo.  We also need to pay for the batteries up front before they can be ordered (which, once ordered, will take several weeks to be delivered).  If we do not raise all of the funds we need in this campaign, we will use what we do raise to purchase the batteries and/or the initial used limo and continue working toward this. Our builder will start on the conversion once we have the batteries and limo purchased.  He is confident and supports the project fully and is therefore willing to work with us.
Given the huge size of the limo industry, there is tremendous room for growth in NYC, as well as opportunities in other U.S. and foreign cities. 

Your investment in this campaign is crucial.  
We can buy a good used Lincoln limo for approximately $20,000.  A Rolls Royce or Mercedes for about $50,000.  The cost of the batteries is about $22,000.  The builder's labor cost of conversion and other electrical components is $25,000.  Thus, we will need approximately $67,000 to build the least expensive electric Lincoln version, plus the costs to license, insure and operate it.  To build a Rolls Royce or Mercedes electric limo will be just under $100K.  We will continue to invest our own funds to launch and are seeking $65,000 to allow us additional funds to at least convert a Lincoln -- or with additional funding, a Rolls Royce or Mercedes limo.  We will also continue to raise funds to convert additional limousines.  

The funds you help us raise will LAUNCH our very first electric rocket!  Every dollar raised will fuel our success!  Small changes can achieve big results.  Join us.  Help us.  Together we will make powerful improvements to our world one limo at a time! 
In return for your support, we offer you some great rewards as described above.  We also have an exciting, secret weapon that we will use to further launch this business into the stratosphere that we cannot disclose at this time on this very public page; but once we reach our initial $65,000 goal, we will disclose this secret plan to each of our backers that have contributed at least $25 as well as provide each such backer with an additional, wonderful gift; we cannot disclose it before that time without putting such plan in jeopardy.  
If you would like to support our cause, but are not presently in a position to help financially, you can still contribute greatly by liking our Facebook page or by following us on Twitter and sending out a sweet tweet on Twitter to your followers with a link to this campaign.  You can use the share tools  on this website too.
Thank you very much! We hope to meet you someday soon and get a chance to show you around NYC in a beautiful, earth-changing electric limo that you helped to make a reality!

story:
My Background:

I want to inspire a community change maker revolution! While I have not had a steady full time or part time job over the past sixteen months, I have been very active in my community. From volunteering my time to help develop a small non-profit to being part of the visioning team for an urban, eco-centric village project, my life has been rich with wonderful people, amazing ideas, and loads of generosity. More and more, I have been asking myself: “What would it look like if this were the norm? What if more people were able to do something like I have been doing?" 

Past experience:

In one form or another, I have been actively serving my entire adult life. Here are a few highlights of the volunteer efforts from my past.

1. In 1998, I was 1 of 8 undergraduate students honored by the Chancellor of the University of Wisconsin-River Falls for service to the campus community.

2. In 2004, after six years as a volunteer English as a Second Language teacher, I co-founded with five others an adult basic education non-profit located in downtown St. Paul. http://www.fireprograms.org/

3. Between 2007-2010, I took seven classes of adult ESL students to the Minnesota state capital to meet and lobby their state representatives, and taught multiple creative writing classes for recent immigrants and refugees. 

Current Projects:

I am currently offering my time and skills in three local communities: Clouds in Water Zen Center, the Whealthy Human Village, and Zintkala Luta - Red Bird.

Clouds in Water Zen Center - I am in my 3rd year as Chairman of the Board of Directors. Having sucessefully led the board's efforts to create an organizational development plan, including strategic planning elements for the next 3-5 years, I am now leading the board through the process of deciding what the Center's future home will look like. You can learn more about Clouds here. http://cloudsinwater.org/ 

The Whealthy Human Village is a grassroots, educational and neighborhood transformation project. Among it's chief aims are to support community dialogue, skills and resource sharing, and to promote earth-centric values and ways of living. I am part of the visioning team, and was a key contributer to the recent Village weekend held in the Powderhorn Park neighborhood. Check out the project here. https://www.facebook.com/whealthyhumanvillage

Zintkala Luta - Red Bird is a Minneapolis-based non-profit organization. It's mission is "to serve the people of D/Lakota heritage located in the Twin Cities area by providing educational programming and services to facilitate community unity and encourage cultural identity." I am currently serving as a consultant for the organization, as it makes the transition into a full-fledged non-profit. Amongst the work I am doing includes grant writing, helping build a web presence, and supporting the development of the organization's board of directors. (While this position will be a paid one at some point, until the organization has raised a decent amount of money, the level of pay will probably not be enough to sustain my basic needs.)

A Future Vision:

To develop an organization dedicated to the health and wellness of low income, traditionally underserved populations. (I am especially interested in working again with recent immigrant and refugees.) The organization would offer programs in yoga/meditation, arts and writing, and alternative and traditional medicines, while being an incubator for cross-cultural connections and community development.

Current Needed funds:

I have a goal of $3000. The funds will be used to cover basic living expenses. Although I have made a small amount of income from freelance writing work, it hasn't been nearly enough to cover expenses over the past year. My savings have dwindled during this period, but the desire to serve and to be a change maker in the Twin Cities has only increased.

I truly believe that it is our birthright to do what we are called to do in this world. In supporting me, you are also giving hope to others who wish to give more of their lives over to service, and to, in the process, transform the places we live in.

The three projects I am working on are already positively impacting hundreds of lives. And it is my hope than in sharing the skills and knowledge that I have, that many more will benefit.

The times are calling for us to re-place volunteering and community service back in the center. To cease seeing helping others and giving back as something some people do to fill in their time after work, or on the weekends. Please join me, and spread the word, as we together create a new revolution.

Please spread the word about my campaign, and about the groups I am working with.

My gratitude goes out to all those who I am currently working and serving with, as well as to the Earth itself for giving us life, beauty, and bounty.

story:
Our Story

Hey guys,

we are three students currently attending University College London (Milana Katz, Ana Martins, Mathias Toubiana) and we plan on embarking on a 36 hour journey to get as far from London as we possibly can. The goal is simple: to raise as much money for the Great Ormond Street Hospital (Children's hospital). There is a catch, however, we cannot spend any money while trying to get as far from UCL as we can. Last year the winners reached as far as Poland and we hope to beat that mark while raising as much money as possible for the charity. We are devoted to and excited about this challenge and we assure you we'll do our best to get as far as we can. But in the end the most important thing is to contribute to a charitable cause and help children in need of medical attention. 

This is all legit, and our progress can be followed by a GPS tracking system so you can know exactly where we are and how we are doing in our 36 hour ordeal.  

for more information and for matters of transparency, we have attached the official event page.

The Impact

All your donations will go to the Great Ormond Street Hospital and to the UCL Body and Soul Soul Charity. You have a chance to make a difference in these kid's lives with a little donation.


What We Need & What You Get

We are setting our goal at 500 pounds as this charity is honorable and deserves our attention. To be honest, the minimum amount of raised money needed to participate is 50 pounds, however, our drive is not to get 50 pounds and start the challenge but it is to actually make a difference. No matter what happens, even if we lose, all the money will go to the charity.


Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help by donating miles, or sponsoring flights/train rides. Please message us directly if you intend to do so as these other donations would go into a separate category and will not be included in the charity for the hospital.

story:
Once upon a time...

If you're here, you probably know who I am, but let's recap.

 

  • My name is Hayley Jane
  • I'm a burlesque dancer, musician, make-up artist, and maker of things.
  • I'm 21 years old.
  • I live in my car.
  • I'm a sexual health and body positivity advocate
  • I'm also a faerie, but I don't know if that really relates to what we're talking about.
 
Some folks have expressed interest in seeing nude, partially nude, or just altogether more racy photos of me, since I do post a lot of photos of my burlesque on the internet.
So, here we are! 
 

I'm starting an 18+ paysite. Why? 

 

  • Because I want to. 
  • Because it's something I've been considering for a while now. 
  • Because it's a safe way to guarantee minors don't see pictures their parents don't want them to see on my watch. 
  • Because I need residual income if I'm going to make a living doing what I love.

 

[Because it's about damn time I get paid for all the work I do online!]

 

A lot of people, when they hear this, assume I am going into porn. Allow me to clarify. 

[Calm down, Mom, I'm not going into porn.] 

 

This will NOT be a pornographic website. [This is not to say I find anything wrong with media of this variety, it's just not what you're going to find on my website.] But we can still have fun, nerds & pervs!

 

What WILL NOT be on the Members Area of my Paysite:

 

  • Close up shots of my vagina worthy of a place on a gynecologist's wall
  • Lady-on-lady sexy times action, wherein one of the parties is one Miss Hayley Jane
  • Lady-on-dude sexy times action, wherein one of the parties is one Miss Hayley Jane
  • Footage, photos, or drawings of anything phallic being stuck into any of my holes
 

 

What WILL be on the Members Area of my Paysite:

 

  • Creative, sexy, original clothed, nude, and topless photos of one Miss Hayley Jane
  • Behind-the-scenes photos and video of shows, costuming, photoshoots, etc.
  • A personal blog
  • The first look at new burlesque acts, music, and other projects

 

 

 

How Billing Will Work:
There will 4 levels of billing. Nerd, Perv, Addict, and Stalker!
  • NERD: If you sign up for one month, you pay $15, with full access to the Members area. The recurring charge will be $10 a month with the option to cancel at any time.
  • PERV: If you sign up for 3 months, you pay $30, with full access to the Members area. The recurring charge will be $8 a month after your original 3 months, with the option to cancel at any time.
  • ADDICT: If you sign up for 6 months, you pay $45, with full access to the Members area, as well as a monthly newsletter featuring original content not on the website. The recurring charge will be $6 a month after your original 6 months, with the option to cancel at any time.
  • STALKER: IF YOU SIGN UP FOR ONE YEAR: You pay $60, with a recurring charge of $5 a month after your first year. You get full access to the Members area, the monthly newsletter, and more benefits will be announced after I discover more about the capabilities of the aMember software.
 
Unfortunately, you will not be able to join using PayPal, as PayPal does not allow adult content to be purchased via their services. I'm currently looking into alternative credit card processing.

 

What I Need & What You Get

What I Need:
  • A decent camera with which to take said illicit photos [$801: Canon EOS Rebel T2i w/ insurance, a wireless remote, and a tripod]
  • aMember software [$180], so my site can become a membership site!
  • New website hosting [$120], so's I don't get shut down for having "adult" content
  • To pay my graphic/web designer for designing a whole new website [$200-$300]

I've set this up so that I only receive the funds if I raise all $1500 over the next 30 days. If I don't raise everything, you get your money back, and maybe I'll try again someday. [I  realize that according to the numbers above, I only need $1401, but I did the math for the camera after setting the goal. That extra $99 will go towards covering fees should I need to use a new credit card processor, paying my web/graphic girl, or Photoshop.] 


What You Get:

 

  • NERDLING: Donate $5 or more and you get one high-resolution photo of Miss Hayley Jane emailed to you straight away
  • CLOSET CASE: Donate $10 or more and you get one month of access to the Members area, with a monthly $10 recurring subscription if you so desire, and one high-resolution photo of Miss Hayley Jane emailed to you straight away
  • FULL-BLOWN NERD: Donate $25 or more and you get 3 months of access to the Members area, with a monthly $8 recurring subscription if you so desire, and one high-resolution photo of Miss Hayley Jane emailed to you straight away
  • PERVERT PRIMARY: Donate $40 or more and you get 6 months of access to the Members area, with an monthly $8 recurring subscription if you so desire, and one high-resolution photo of Miss Hayley Jane emailed to you straight away
  • RESTRAINING ORDER: Donate $100 or more and you get one year of access to the Members area, with a monthly $5 recurring subscription if you so desire, and one high-resolution photo of Miss Hayley Jane emailed to you straight away.

 

Sharing is Caring! If you can't donate yourself, spread the word to someone who can!

Lady-on-lady sexy times action, wherein one of the parties is one Miss Hayley Jane
Lady-on-dude sexy times action, wherein one of the parties is one Miss Hayley Jane
Footage, photos, or drawings of anything phallic being stuck into any of my holes

 
 
What WILL be on the Members Area of my Paysite:
 

Creative, sexy, original clothed, nude, and topless photos of one Miss Hayley Jane
Behind-the-scenes photos and video of shows, costuming, photoshoots, etc.
A personal blog
The first look at new burlesque acts, music, and other projects

 
 
 
How Billing Will Work:
There will 4 levels of billing. Nerd, Perv, Addict, and Stalker!



NERD: If you sign up for one month, you pay $15, with full access to the Members area. The recurring charge will be $10 a month with the option to cancel at any time.

PERV: If you sign up for 3 months, you pay $30, with full access to the Members area. The recurring charge will be $8 a month after your original 3 months, with the option to cancel at any time.

ADDICT: If you sign up for 6 months, you pay $45, with full access to the Members area, as well as a monthly newsletter featuring original content not on the website. The recurring charge will be $6 a month after your original 6 months, with the option to cancel at any time.

STALKER: IF YOU SIGN UP FOR ONE YEAR: You pay $60, with a recurring charge of $5 a month after your first year. You get full access to the Members area, the monthly newsletter, and more benefits will be announced after I discover more about the capabilities of the aMember software.

 
Unfortunately, you will not be able to join using PayPal, as PayPal does not allow adult content to be purchased via their services. I'm currently looking into alternative credit card processing.

 


What I Need & What You Get
What I Need:


A decent camera with which to take said illicit photos [$801: Canon EOS Rebel T2i w/ insurance, a wireless remote, and a tripod]
aMember software [$180], so my site can become a membership site!
New website hosting [$120], so's I don't get shut down for having "adult" content
To pay my graphic/web designer for designing a whole new website [$200-$300]


I've set this up so that I only receive the funds if I raise all $1500 over the next 30 days. If I don't raise everything, you get your money back, and maybe I'll try again someday. [I  realize that according to the numbers above, I only need $1401, but I did the math for the camera after setting the goal. That extra $99 will go towards covering fees should I need to use a new credit card processor, paying my web/graphic girl, or Photoshop.]  


What You Get:
 

NERDLING: Donate $5 or more and you get one high-resolution photo of Miss Hayley Jane emailed to you straight away
CLOSET CASE: Donate $10 or more and you get one month of access to the Members area, with a monthly $10 recurring subscription if you so desire, and one high-resolution photo of Miss Hayley Jane emailed to you straight away
FULL-BLOWN NERD: Donate $25 or more and you get 3 months of access to the Members area, with a monthly $8 recurring subscription if you so desire, and one high-resolution photo of Miss Hayley Jane emailed to you straight away
PERVERT PRIMARY: Donate $40 or more and you get 6 months of access to the Members area, with an monthly $8 recurring subscription if you so desire, and one high-resolution photo of Miss Hayley Jane emailed to you straight away
RESTRAINING ORDER: Donate $100 or more and you get one year of access to the Members area, with a monthly $5 recurring subscription if you so desire, and one high-resolution photo of Miss Hayley Jane emailed to you straight away.

 


Sharing is Caring! If you can't donate yourself, spread the word to someone who can!

story:
Why this campaign is born

Dear friends,Even though Bangadesh is governed by secular laws , yet Homosexuality is criminalized  by the section 377A of Bangladesh Penal code.The law punished sodomy even induced by consenting adults by imprisonment upto 10 years along with hefty fines. 

The campaign mission

Create awareness about the plight of helpless Bangladeshi LGBT through seminar, symposiums and publication in Bangladesh

  • Appeal to the government to decriminalize Homosexuality 
  • Produce documentary short  film on this tabu topic so that average Bangladeshi audience get educated on gender diversity
  • Connect Bangladeshi LGBT communities to international Pride Rally and gender equality movement

 

Funding goal:


Our goal is to raise $35000 by mid September,2012.

The administrator of this funding campaign will personally visit Bangladesh and if possible Pakistan in 2012 December. My immediate objective is to coordinate with different NGOs ( Non Governmental Organizations) to create a humanitarian appeal campaign so that LGBT communities can feel free of fear and repression

30% of donations will be utilized to organize seminar and symposium.

30% of funds will spent on producing print and digital media publication.

20% of proceeds will be used to create a victim compensation funds.

Rest will  be earmarked for administration expense, future campaign needs

 

Perks:

Donors over $50 dollar contributions will receive personal DVD copy of documentary film

Please note should I fail to reach the funding goal, then all the donation proceeds will be utilized to help Bangladeshi NGOs working on improving lot of LGBT communities in Bangladesh

 

The Impact

  • Yor donation will help us to highlight the sufferings of Gay/Lesbians and transgender minorities and achieve their basic human rights in Bangladesh

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this  campaign though social media like Facebook, twitter, myspace.

story:
We will match pledges up to $25,000 in free CLP shipped to our troops in Iraq & Afghanstan upon passing phase 2 at Aberdeen Proving Grounds. Newly added, we will also martch pledges up to $25,000 in Joint Lube to Wounded Warriors foundation and info on this product is at www.quickenlube.com making available a max total $50,000 in product with $25,000 in pledges.

Update: Shipments should be out by Nov 10 or sooner.

This futuristic "Universal Lubricant™" has already passed 16 of the most grueling, phase one tests for MIL-PRF-63460E amnd 3 at Picitinni Arsenal and needs to be evaluated at Aberdeen Proving grounds for final approval for US Military and NATO use. The attached video and youtube.com clips show the wide scope of applications for this diamond coating treatment, however it works anywhere friction needs to be reduced, large or small, slow or fast, high or low temp, low or high pressure.

How is this new Diamond Coating discovery better than anything else before it?

  • It reduces friction by preventing Metal on Metal contact,
  • Prevents wear under high or low pressure
  • Reduces heat by superthermal transfer
  • Increases MPG up to 35% or more by multiple means
  • Treated parts are much easier to clean
  • Seals rings and reduces head temperature
  • Smoothes out gear chatter
  • Works on tools large and small
  • Works on any bearing surface from small to large
  • Works in hydraulic systems too

I invented this space aged product with the intent to supply our armed forces with absolutely the best high temperature, high pressure friction barrier available. In order to supply products to the military, extensive and expensive testing is required to assure that specific military standards are met. This product has already passed the 16 grueling phase one tests at Picatinni Arsenal, and is ready for the final phase of tests at Aberdeen Proving grounds. Once passed, this breakthrough product will be intergraded into the US Military. The last thing a solder needs is equipment jamming under fire, and our new Nanotech material stops jamming and reduces wear, greatly extending the useful life of treated parts. Any amount above our target shall be applied to other areas of advancement toward a better protected military.

Over $600,000 has been invested in this project which has produced a product that reduces friction so much, it increases fuel economy up to 35% while virtually eliminating wear in treated parts. As an added benefit, Soot emissions are reduced by over 50% as proven with oil analysis. Also rated Grade A by Gun Tests Magazine. If you want to protect your valuable machinery, no matter what it is, old or new - you need our treatments.

NanoLube, Inc has the ONLY license to distribute this patent pending discovery, and we currently have only Three sub-distributors, one in North Carolina, one in New Zealand and GrobetUSA an international jewelry and watch supply company. ANYONE else claiming to have "Spherical NanoDiamond" is not being honest.

Once funded, Aberdeen Proving Grounds will prepare for final phase testing on IAW MIL-PRF-63460-E Amendment 3. Previous weapons testing in Iraq have already proven the superior ability of our diamond coatings to provide jam-free operation of the M249SAW(Squad Automatic Weapon), however the Army must follow specific test protocols prior to integrating a new product into their system. The anticipated challenge will be keeping up with orders required to adequately stock depots world wide.

The names of all Pledgers unless requested otherwise, will be posted on our Support Our Troops webpage.

The options below are available to suit your needs, even though all options are not listed below. if you want $10,000 in small bottles, pledge on the 4 Platinum Semi Treatments - as it is no problem even though there is no specific listing, we are going for military funding and can accomidate any need.

the first link below shows the treatment of two Harley Davidson.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cB7SWJJZHMY&feature=youtu.be 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=516eilaHNj8&feature=plcp Camaro .3 sec faster and now pulls wheelies, and the treatment has not been fully worked in yet.

 
100%
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vJBXnG26TNw high speed bearing

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ygKVqnWFrqI Cutoff Tool treatment

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IMvcuKpfZ2c NS Southern Bridge Repair

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kjNLlhllcvk&feature=related WINDPOWER

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=99ccGM9Kmw8&feature=plcp original video with Harley Davidson and Camaro treatments

story:
The Company

Summary. We will form a small whiskey company in South Bend, create a sophisticated product that rivals national brands, and inspire a truly cult following.


Mission Statement. The Indiana Whiskey Company is Indiana’s premier whiskey microdistiller. We make a truly excellent small-batch product that blends Indiana’s best ingredients with its individual style.


Entrepreneur’s Skill Set. Charles Florance is fanatical about whiskey and Indiana. A Purdue chemistry undergraduate, Charles served 12 years in the Infantry. During a mobilization for Operation Iraqi Freedom, he contracted Guillain-Barre syndrome, was hospitalized, and after a lengthy recovery continued to have persistent nerve damage in his extremities. When he left the Army’s Wounded Warrior Program in 2010, he found that the best way to combat the resulting nerve pain was with whiskey. But the catharsis didn’t come from alcohol; it came from sharing good products with truly great people. A long-time resident of Indiana, he was shocked to discover there are no great small batch whiskey products available to Hoosiers. Being a hobby brewer for over a decade, he decided to go to Notre Dame’s MBA program to get smart on the financial aspects of successfully starting and running a distillery.

The Indiana Whiskey Company donates 3% of profits to Veteran vocational rehabilitation and substance abuse treatment programs.

  Thanks for investing in the Spirit of Indiana.

story:
OUR STORY:

2 summers ago in Massachusetts, a crew of two built an 8' catamaran and successfully sailed along the coast of the Atlantic Ocean.  This October, we explore the Pacific.  Over the past several days, a small group of filmmakers have been building a 16' foot, 2 sail pirate ship outfitted with a small cabin and captains deck.  On October 27, we will launch from the top of Santa Monica Beach and sail along the coast of Southern California, down to Marina Del Ray.  If our ship proves itself seaworthy, we will begin our excursion to Catalina Island, 30 miles of shark infested waters off shore.


We believe that if there is 1 thing that is missing from our generation, it is the sense of pure adventure.  With unemployment on the rise, we find it imperative that our spirits not be hampered.  Hence the need for this excursion.  However, our fundings have come up short.  This is where we need your support.

WHAT WE NEED:

Having invested over several hundred dollars of pocket expenses, we have been able to construct a watertight hull and walls of our ship.  We now need a mast, rudder, keel, cabin, lifejackets, inflatable safety rafts and additional rigging supplies.  We are asking for a small donation from you to make this journey possible.   

THE AFTERMATH:

We will be documenting this journey with a multi camera shoot.  Several cameras will be positioned along Santa Monica and Venice beach.  The remainder will be on board with us.  After our journey is complete, will will produce a documentary of the entire trip, available for screening to those who donate from your very own home.  In addition, donators will receive a live video updates along the course of our journey, as well as location updates in the event you would like to come see us in person.  All updates will be posted on our site (rumtrouble@tumblr.com) for you to follow. 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP:

Come and witness our excursion first hand.  Bring friends, dates, family, and a camera and help us with the documentation. And be sure to spread the word!

HELP US BRING BACK THE SPIRIT OF ADVENTURE!!!

story:
Our Story

My name is Giovanni Jovanovic and I work in the deli at Founders Brewing Company.  A running joke, which is really true, is that everyone who works at Founders is either an artist or a musician.  I have worked with members of UV Hippo, Paucity, Bram and Dexous, Chance Jones, CIRCUS PIG!, Nicholas James and the Bandwagon, Lights at Sea, Afro Zuma, Red Frog, Total Blam Blams, Oracle, and a few other bands that I can't quite remember.  I came to the realization that I am surrounded by such talented people and I wanted to help my friends out the best way I could so a few months ago I took the initiative and started a record label.  Third Estate Records is based on the notion of a mass of poor artists and musicians uniting to change society to create a better world for all.  This simple goal is daunting, but anything can be achieved one step at a time. 


You may ask 'where does a button maker fit in?' This is a valid question.  Most people who speak of changing the world don't require access to a button maker, but one step at a time.  Third Estate Records wants to be able to produce band merchandise as cheaply as possible.  Sticker printers and screen printing machines are very expensive, but a button maker can be put to use right away to cut costs and help all the musicians I know.


Third Estate Records wants to purchase a Model 100 1" Button Maker with a Punch Cutter Model 1313 along with enough supplies to make 2,500 1" buttons.  To fulfill this goal Third Estate Records is offering custom buttons to anyone who helps fund this project


The Impact

My goal for Third Estate Records is to be a record label that helps emerging artists.  I want to provide starting musicians the experience needed to grow into regularly performing artists.  This campaign is just one piece of the greater whole.

What We Need & What You Get

Here are the actual costs
Model 100 One Inch Button Maker: $194.95
Punch Cutter Model 1313: $149.95
Supplies to make 2,500 One Inch Buttons:  $149.95

My main goal is to purchase the Model 100 Button Maker.  My secondary goal is to purchase the Model 1313 Punch Cutter.  Any money raised that exceeds the first two goals will be used to purchase supplies to make buttons.  Any quantity of button supplies can be purchased, but the 2,500 amount is my ideal.

Any amount of money raised will be used to fund the goals of this campaign.  My own income is being used to fund Third Estate Records, and any help is greatly appreciated.

I want everyone who donates to become part of Third Estate Records.  The historical meaning of the third estate comes from the social hierarchy of Christian Medieval Europe.  The first estate is the Clergy, the second estate is the Nobility and the third estate is the peasants.  In France, the third estate revolted to destroy old ideas of hierarchy and embrace the revolutionary idea of equal rights to all. What Third Estate Records is offering to everyone who donates is membership. 

Since Third Estate Records is just starting out, the details of membership are still pretty vague.  The customary benefits of discounted merchandise, free concert tickets, and other perks will be offered, but I have something greater in mind.  Membership to Third Estate Records should include greater collaboration between artists and musicians.  A network that benefits everyone involved. 

Also included in funding this campaign is custom buttons.  Musicians will use album pre-sales to fund the production of an album, and we are using custom button pre-sales to fund the purchase of a button maker. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Anyone can help with this campaign, whether you donate or not.  It is simple, all you have to do is pass the word along in Facebook, or other social site.  The more people who hear about this campaign, the more likely it will get full funded.


Thanks for looking and Third Estate Records greatly appreciates all the help.
